p: The aerial part of A. campestris L. was collected at flowering stage in September 2012 in desert region of Figuig (in South-East of Morocco in the border area with Algeria). The species was identified by a botanist Pr. Aatika Mihamou from biology department, and a voucher specimen was deposited in the herbarium of the Faculty of Sciences, University Mohamed First (Oujda, Morocco) under the number HUMPOM-151.
